

I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select configuration_key as cfgKey, configuration_value as cfgValue
                          from product_type_layout;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select value
            from sessions
            where sesskey = '7d3mrroanedkucfp333uu3voo7'
            and expiry > '1354787037';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select template_dir from template_select where template_language in (2, 0) order by template_language DESC;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select banners_id, date_scheduled
                      from banners
                      where date_scheduled != 'NULL';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select b.banners_id, b.expires_date, b.expires_impressions,
                             sum(bh.banners_shown) as banners_shown
                      from banners b, banners_history bh
                      where b.status = 1
                      and b.banners_id = bh.banners_id
                      group by b.banners_id, b.expires_date, b.expires_impressions;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select specials_id, products_id
                       from specials
                       where status = '0'
                       and (((specials_date_available <= 20121206 and specials_date_available != '0001-01-01') and (expires_date > 20121206))
                       or ((specials_date_available <= 20121206 and specials_date_available != '0001-01-01') and (expires_date = '0001-01-01'))
                       or (specials_date_available = '0001-01-01' and expires_date > 20121206))
                       ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select specials_id, products_id
                       from specials
                       where status = '1'
                       and (20121206 < specials_date_available and specials_date_available != '0001-01-01')
                       ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select specials_id, products_id
                       from specials
                       where status = '1'
                       and ((20121206 >= expires_date and expires_date != '0001-01-01')
                       or (20121206 < specials_date_available and specials_date_available != '0001-01-01'));



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select featured_id
                       from featured
                       where status = '0'
                       and (((featured_date_available <= 20121206 and featured_date_available != '0001-01-01') and (expires_date > 20121206))
                       or ((featured_date_available <= 20121206 and featured_date_available != '0001-01-01') and (expires_date = '0001-01-01'))
                       or (featured_date_available = '0001-01-01' and expires_date > 20121206))
                       ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select featured_id
                       from featured
                       where status = '1'
                       and (20121206 < featured_date_available and featured_date_available != '0001-01-01')
                       ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select featured_id
                       from featured
                       where status = '1'
                       and ((20121206 >= expires_date and expires_date != '0001-01-01')
                       or (20121206 < featured_date_available and featured_date_available != '0001-01-01'));



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select sale_id
                       from salemaker_sales
                       where sale_status = '0'
                       and (((sale_date_start <= 20121206 and sale_date_start != '0001-01-01') and (sale_date_end > 20121206))
                       or ((sale_date_start <= 20121206 and sale_date_start != '0001-01-01') and (sale_date_end = '0001-01-01'))
                       or (sale_date_start = '0001-01-01' and sale_date_end > 20121206))
                       ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select sale_id
                       from salemaker_sales
                       where sale_status = '1'
                       and (20121206 < sale_date_start and sale_date_start != '0001-01-01')
                       ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select sale_id
                       from salemaker_sales
                       where sale_status = '1'
                       and ((20121206 >= sale_date_end and sale_date_end != '0001-01-01')
                       or (20121206 < sale_date_start and sale_date_start != '0001-01-01'));



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select configuration_value from configuration where configuration_key='ADMIN_DEMO';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select * from admin where admin_name='demo' or admin_name='Admin';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT admin_id from admin
          WHERE admin_id = 3
          AND admin_profile = 1;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT ip_address from admin_activity_log LIMIT 1;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select code, title, symbol_left, symbol_right, decimal_point,
                                         thousands_point, decimal_places, value
                                  from currencies;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select languages_id, name, code, image, directory
                               from languages order by sort_order;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT project_version_major, project_version_minor FROM project_version WHERE project_version_key = 'Zen-Cart Database';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select configuration_value from configuration where configuration_key='MODULE_PAYMENT_INSTALLED';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select configuration_value from configuration where configuration_key='MODULE_SHIPPING_INSTALLED';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select * from coupon_gv_queue where release_flag='N';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT menu_key, language_key FROM admin_menus ORDER BY sort_order;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT admin_id from admin
          WHERE admin_id = 3
          AND admin_profile = 1;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT * FROM product_types WHERE type_handler != 'product';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT ap.menu_key, ap.page_key, ap.main_page, ap.page_params, ap.language_key as page_name
          FROM admin_pages ap
          LEFT JOIN admin_menus am ON am.menu_key = ap.menu_key WHERE ap.display_on_menu = 'Y' ORDER BY am.sort_order, ap.sort_order;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select c.customers_id, c.customers_lastname, c.customers_firstname, c.customers_email_address, c.customers_group_pricing, a.entry_country_id, a.entry_company, ci.customers_info_date_of_last_logon, ci.customers_info_date_account_created , c.customers_telephone, a.entry_company, a.entry_street_address, a.entry_city, a.entry_postcode, c.customers_authorization, c.customers_referral,
    cgc.amount
    from customers c
    left join customers_info ci on c.customers_id= ci.customers_info_id
    left join address_book a on c.customers_id = a.customers_id and c.customers_default_address_id = a.address_book_id 
    left join coupon_gv_customer cgc on c.customers_id = cgc.customer_id  order by c.customers_lastname DESC, c.customers_firstname;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as total  from customers c     left join customers_info ci on c.customers_id= ci.customers_info_id     left join address_book a on c.customers_id = a.customers_id and c.customers_default_address_id = a.address_book_id      left join coupon_gv_customer cgc on c.customers_id = cgc.customer_id ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select c.customers_id, c.customers_lastname, c.customers_firstname, c.customers_email_address, c.customers_group_pricing, a.entry_country_id, a.entry_company, ci.customers_info_date_of_last_logon, ci.customers_info_date_account_created , c.customers_telephone, a.entry_company, a.entry_street_address, a.entry_city, a.entry_postcode, c.customers_authorization, c.customers_referral,     cgc.amount     from customers c     left join customers_info ci on c.customers_id= ci.customers_info_id     left join address_book a on c.customers_id = a.customers_id and c.customers_default_address_id = a.address_book_id      left join coupon_gv_customer cgc on c.customers_id = cgc.customer_id  order by c.customers_lastname DESC, c.customers_firstname limit 0, 20;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select customers_info_date_account_created as date_account_created,
                                   customers_info_date_account_last_modified as date_account_last_modified,
                                   customers_info_date_of_last_logon as date_last_logon,
                                   customers_info_number_of_logons as number_of_logons
                            from customers_info
                            where customers_info_id = '1';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select group_name, group_percentage from group_pricing where
                                     group_id = '0';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT c.*, ab.* from customers c
                                          left join address_book ab on c.customers_id = ab.customers_id
                                          WHERE c.customers_id = '1';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select customers_info_date_account_created as date_account_created,
                                   customers_info_date_account_last_modified as date_account_last_modified,
                                   customers_info_date_of_last_logon as date_last_logon,
                                   customers_info_number_of_logons as number_of_logons
                            from customers_info
                            where customers_info_id = '2';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select countries_name
                                 from countries
                                 where countries_id = '223';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as number_of_reviews
                                 from reviews where customers_id = '2';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select group_name, group_percentage from group_pricing where
                                     group_id = '0';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT c.*, ab.* from customers c
                                          left join address_book ab on c.customers_id = ab.customers_id
                                          WHERE c.customers_id = '2';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select o.orders_id, o.date_purchased, o.order_total, o.currency, o.currency_value,
                                          cgc.amount
                                          from orders o
                                          left join coupon_gv_customer cgc on o.customers_id = cgc.customer_id
                                          where customers_id='2' order by date_purchased desc;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select amount from coupon_gv_customer where customer_id = '2';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT * from project_version WHERE project_version_key = 'Zen-Cart Database' ORDER BY project_version_date_applied DESC LIMIT 1;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as total
            from sessions
            where sesskey = '7d3mrroanedkucfp333uu3voo7';
